channel.title: How to make commands pop up ingame...delta source
channel.description:
Hey guys i was wondering if someone could tell me how to make all of my commands pop up when i type ::commands ingame..
example: :: commands :: shops ::starter :: home etc... IM pretty sure theirs probably in tutorial page but its somewhere way down in the pages. thanks

item.title: How to make commands pop up ingame...delta source
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

You should have it listed in an interface instead so it doesn’t spam the entire chatbox.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make commands pop up ingame...delta source

item.title: How to make commands pop up ingame...delta source
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Delta right?
You could use sM to send a message of all the commands, if that’s what you wanted.

Read full topic
